column5: I was  a little bored today so I decided to install my Troll Master.I ended up with this after talking to Slowpoke(Brian) and Fishindevil(Shawn) this fall.At the time they were a little expensive.So I had almost given up the plan when I received an email from Brain showing that Cabelas had them on for half price.They were all sold out except for the one that fits a Yamaha 9.9 High Thrust.Well luck was on my side because that's what my kicker is. So off to the grat outdoors to remove my kicker from the boat and bring it down to the work room.The install took about an hour and a half.It all fit great except for the motor bracket .But after a few fancy bends it was complete.     With this I wont have to keep running to the back of the boat to adjust my speed and I will be able to return to the speed that was catching fish after going to an idle with just a press of the button. Anybody else run one of these.I would be interested in your opinions. Now all I have to do is wait for spring. Dan

Thats a sweet set up. Do you know of any set ups similar to that, that would work on a 40 mariner tiller?? I'd love to have something to set my speed and just leave it. The way mine is now, I can't take my hand off the tiller...........I don't think there is anything like that though?  Maybe its time to upgrade my engine.........  Sinker

You'll love it. I install one on my Yahama High Thurst last summer and can't believe I was trolling without it before. Mine is the new version though with the LCD screen (PRO III).  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
that's nice  it sure will be handy

Awesome unit bud !!!! you will use that everytime man  ,they can swim but they cant hide now !!...cant wait too see that in action on lake ontario in the spring...only a few months to go dan !!!!...cheers bud
Dont worry Shawn April on the first salmon hunt you will be there.
What's it like to be Dan?
Yes brian i was just thinking that !!!! LOL..LOL..LOL..    i cant wait dan,i have already started organizing & sorting out the old & the new !!!!
That looks great Dan it will make it a lot easer for trolling can you get that unit for any size kicker?  Rob
Probably every newer model and limited older models but I'm sure it could be adapted. I think model designation has most to do with bracket design - not positive.

Yes I think your right on the bracket Brian.The one that came with my kit looked to be for an older model Yamaha.But with some time spent bending to change the angle so the cowl would fit  it was a go.Other than that it's pretty simple to install. Dan
Nice, but really do you have to catch more Salmon  I know that would really be nice to get back to the sweet spot trolling speed.  thanks for the pics
Wow very nice Dan now is there anything else that boat may be missing besides a roof and a Microwave.  Mike
congrats on your pickup it that just for speed or does it  have auto pilot
No auto pilot on that model.But thats what I use my Terrova for.
